title: Gaming Laptop Sales Be LIT
description: *Today's video sponsor* Go sign up to Linode here:   Apparently you can find crazy deals on Gaming Laptops at the moment. So I decided to check one out.   Here is a link to the laptop the Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3i (The price keeps going up)  Link not affiliated  Get some AWESOME Dawid merch here:   Join this channel and help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on:   Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   -Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate- Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
